a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Projections of the number of children per woman by education
Shown is the total fertility rate as projected by the Wittgenstein Centre. In the original data the fertility rate refer to 5 year windows.
For limitations of the visualisation tool the mid-year for each window is shown here instead. (For example 1973 here refers to the
Data source: WC-IIASA (Fertility Rate by education scenario) (2017)
